long_description: The Profile RM 21 saddle mount water bottle cage stashes 2 water bottles behind your saddle, enabling easy hydration access and improved aerodynamics. Constructed out of light and sturdy 6061-T6 aluminum with 2 lightweight nylon/fiberglass cages. Cages can be rotated for easy access. Mounting bracket is compatible with standard 7mm saddle rails. Profile RM 21 saddle mount water bottle cage includes CO2 mounting brackets for convenient storage of CO2 cartridges (cartridges not included).
short_description: The Profile RM 21 saddle mount water bottle cage stashes 2 water bottles behind your saddle, enabling easy hydration access and improved aerodynamics.
